level.heading: Computation of alternative entire net income.
level.text: * ยง 11-641.1 Computation of alternative entire net income. (a) Alternative entire net income means entire net income as determined pursuant to section 11-641, except that the deductions described in paragraphs eleven and twelve of subdivision (e) of section 11-641 shall not be allowed. (b) Any election made pursuant to paragraph two of subdivision (b) of section 11-642 with respect to the modification provided for in subdivision (f) of section 11-641 shall be deemed to have been made for purposes of computing alternative entire net income. * NB Amended Ch. 298/85 ยง 41, language juxtaposed per Ch. 907/85 ยง 14 * NB Number supplied by the Legislative Bill Drafting Commission
